Title: Requires license plates for bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
Summary: Requires license plates for bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters in New York city; requires a registration fee for such license plates.
LawCode: Amd Art 34 Art Head, Art 34-D Art Head, add §§1244 & 1290, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring license plates for bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
